unnormalised: New appointments in AI and ML at IIT Delhi. Dr. Arvind Kumar, previously a Senior Scientist at DRDO, joins as Assoc. Prof. in the Computer Science Dept. His research focuses on AI ethics and fairness. IIT Delhi announced that Mr. Rohan Mehra has been appointed visiting lecturer.
normalised: New appointments in A-I and M-L at I-I-T Delhi. Doctor Arvind Kumar, previously a Senior Scientist at D-R-D-O, joins as Associate Professor in the Computer Science Department. His research focuses on A-I ethics and fairness. I-I-T Delhi announced that Mister Rohan Mehra has been appointed visiting lecturer.

unnormalised: Prof. Gayatri Sharma, renowned for her work in quantum computing, has been appointed as the Head of the Quantum Information Processing Lab. She was previously at Univ. of Cambridge. Both appointments reflect the institute's commitment to expanding its expertise in cutting-edge technologies.
normalised: Professor Gayatri Sharma, renowned for her work in quantum computing, has been appointed as the Head of the Quantum Information Processing Lab. She was previously at University of Cambridge. Both appointments reflect the institute's commitment to expanding its expertise in cutting-edge technologies.

unnormalised: The appointments are effective from 1/1/2025. A formal induction ceremony is planned for Jan 15th, 2025, at 10:30 AM. These roles hope to encourage young minds and strengthen IIT's ties to industry.
normalised: The appointments are effective from first January two thousand and twenty five. A formal induction ceremony is planned for January fifteenth, two thousand and twenty five, at ten thirty A-M. These roles hope to encourage young minds and strengthen I-I-T's ties to industry.
